All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AudioManager
The AudioManager class is responsible for managing audio in a JavaFX application.
Card
Represents a playing card with a specific rank, suit, and face orientation.
CardImagesLoader
The CardImagesLoader class provides methods for loading card images.
DeckOfCards
Represents a deck of playing cards.
Game
Represents a card game with players, a deck of cards, and game logic.
GameController
Controller class for the game interface.
IncorrectUserNameException
Exception thrown when an incorrect user name is encountered.
JsonManager
Gestisce la lettura e la scrittura degli utenti in formato JSON.
JTrash
The main class responsible for launching the JavaFX application.
LoggerUtil
The LoggerUtil class provides utility methods for logging information and errors.
LoginController
Controller class responsible for handling user login and registration actions.
Player
Represents a player in the card game.
Rank
Enum representing the ranks of playing cards.
Suits
Enum representing the suits of playing cards.
UnexistingUserException
Exception thrown when attempting to access an unexisting user.
User
Represents a user in the application.
UserAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when attempting to create a user that already exists.
UserController
Controller class responsible for managing user-related actions and interactions in the user interface.
